text:
25/25 means that in a study of 25 people all patients were found to have that symptom. Because these frequencies are based on a specific study, the fractions may be different if another group of patients are examined. Sometimes, no information on frequency is available. In these cases, the sign or symptom may be rare or common.",GARD,"Myasthenia gravis, limb-girdle"
What is (are) Pyomyositis ?,"Pyomyositis is rare bacterial infection of the skeletal muscle (the muscles used for movement). Signs
